body_html:
@raninbowlalala I am using a variation of mobiletnet v2 (imported from slim) and not sure why but I still get the error. The only thing that fine_tune_batch_norm seems to be doing is setting the is_training flag to True?

@HimariO I was not able to spot the difference between deeplab and mobilenetv2 from slim. Any luck for you?

body:
@raninbowlalala I am using a variation of mobiletnet v2 (imported from slim) and not sure why but I still get the error. The only thing that fine_tune_batch_norm seems to be doing is setting the is_training flag to True?

@HimariO I was not able to spot the difference between deeplab and mobilenetv2 from slim. Any luck for you?
